attributes.action: Make the BBC honour the agreement to provide a free TV licence for all over 75's
attributes.background: In 2015 the BBC agreed to fund free TV Licence's for the over 75's in return for other concessions including raising the licence fee in line with inflation and closing the I-Player loophole. They are now trying to back out of this and charge all over 75 year olds not in receipt of pension credit.
